Q_DESC:
Write a program to demonstrate Hexadecimal to Decimal using user defined exception

Help:

1. Create a class HexFormatException extends NumberFormatException

2. Create a Parameterised Constructor under HexFormatException class as follows

a. Method Name = HexFormatException
b. Access Specifier = public
c. Argument = One Argument with String type and variable name msg
d. Use super(msg)

3. In the main method get the input of hexadecimal and call the  static method under main class (TestClass)  

a. Method name = hexCharToDecimal
b. Parameter = One argument with character type
c. If number is not hexadecimal then throw exception message as Number is not Hexadecimal
Hint:
throw new HexFormatException

4. Use catch block with user defined exception as  HexFormatException  with exception instance as e

5. Print the exception message e whenever the exception is thrown from methods
